commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/arcade build 20210827.7

Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk
 From Version 5.0.0-beta.21410.2 -> To Version 5.0.0-beta.21427.7

nodes.body: This change is really annoying but it'll keep happening so I'll try to take it (unless it merges cleanly in which case we'll have to back it out every time).
nodes.diffHunk:
